title: Billy Baldwin reacts after host insists Selena Gomez is Justin Bieber's soulmate
text:
Billy Baldwin's niece Hailey just tied the knot with Justin Bieber last month.

So understandably the actor was a little annoyed to hear a talk show host insisting Selena Gomez was Justin's one true love, and not Hailey.

'I think that for Selena and Justin, they are each other's ones,' host Marci Ines said on the Canadian talk show The Social on Wednesday.

Thumbs down! Billy Baldwin was not happy to hear a talk show host insisting Selena Gomez was Justin Bieber's one true love, and not his niece, Hailey

Adding insult to injury was Marci's insistence Hailey was well aware of her husband's special connection to his ex.

'And when it's like that, even though they didn't marry, when it's like that, the person you're with, like Hailey, knows that and knows it well.'

'She may be Mrs. Bieber, but Selena will forever have his heart,' she added.

Billy gave the remarks a piece of his mind after The Social posted the clip onto their Instagram account.

Dislike! Baldwin gave the clip a piece of his mind in the comments section of Instagram

'Selena will forever have his heart': Marci Ines insisted Gomez and Justin were soulmates

'Really... wow!!' Billy commented in the post, along with a thumbs down emoji.

The love triangle all resurfaced after Selena released her new song about Justin, Lose You To Love Me.

Lyrics in the song appear to reference the short amount of time it took for Justin to move on from Selena to Hailey, who he ended up marrying not long after ending it once and for all with his first love.

First love: Selena and Justin dated on-off for years, before finally calling it quits for good in 2018 (pictured 2011)

Drama erupted not long after Selena released the track Wednesday at midnight.

Hailey posted a screenshot of the song I'll Kill You by Summer Walker, shortly after Selena dropped her track.

Many people interpreted the song as a direct response to Selena's track, but Hailey quickly shut down the speculation and insisted she was not responding to the new music.

Taking a stand: Selena addressed the situation with fans on social media, where she said would not 'stand for women tearing women down'

Selena addressed the situation with fans on social media, where she said would not 'stand for women tearing women down.'

'I am so grateful for the response this song is getting. However, I do not stand for women tearing women down. And I will never, ever be by that.

'So please be kind to everyone. It doesn't matter what the situation is, if you're my fans don't be rude to anyone, please.'

She continued: 'Don't go off and say things that you just feel in the moment. Just please, for me, know that that's not my heart and my heart is only to release things I feel that are me and that I'm proud of. And that's all that I'll say.'
description: 'I think that for Selena and Justin, they are each other's ones,' host Marci Ines said on the Canadian talk show The Social on Wednesday. Billy was not happy to hear the comments.
